message.content:
1. Preoperative chemotherapy was compared at each stage of NSCLC.
2. A statistical survival difference was found in stage II NSCLC.
3. No statistical survival difference was found in stage I and IIIA NSCLC.
4. The median survival time (MST) for stage II NSCLC was 40.86 months.
5. The MST for stage I and IIIA NSCLC was 80.81 months.
6. The P-value for the statistical survival difference in stage II NSCLC was 0.044.

messages.content:
Statement: When comparing the effect of preoperative chemotherapy at each stage of NSCLC, a statistical survival difference was found in stage II NSCLC but not in stage I and IIIA (MST 40.86 months vs 80.81 months) (P = 0.044).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
